org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery
Class AeXQueryExpressionTypeConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.AeAbstractExpressionTypeConverter
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery.AeXQueryExpressionTypeConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeExpressionTypeConverter
public class AeXQueryExpressionTypeConverter
extends AeAbstractExpressionTypeConverter

An implementation of a type converter for Saxon XQuery. This class implements the rules outlined in Saxon regarding how to convert from Saxon types to Java types (there, and back again).

Constructor Summary

 java.lang.Object convertToEngineType(java.lang.Object aExpressionType)

 java.lang.Object convertToExpressionType(java.lang.Object aEngineType)
          Converts the given engine type (an object coming from the BPEL engine) to a type that can be properly handled by the expression language library.

convertToExpressionType

public java.lang.Object convertToExpressionType(java.lang.Object aEngineType)
Description copied from interface: IAeExpressionTypeConverter
Converts the given engine type (an object coming from the BPEL engine) to a type that can be properly handled by the expression language library.

AeAbstractExpressionTypeConverter.convertToExpressionType(java.lang.Object)

convertToEngineType

public java.lang.Object convertToEngineType(java.lang.Object aExpressionType)
Note that the return value from an XQuery expression will always be a Document that Saxon generated for the result. This Document contains a sequence of values which are either atomic types or elements. The AeXQueryTypedExpressionResult class is used to iterate through theose sequence values and return a List of converted Objects.

Parameters:
aExpressionType -
See Also:
IAeExpressionTypeConverter.convertToEngineType(java.lang.Object)

convertFromSaxonType

protected java.lang.Object convertFromSaxonType(net.sf.saxon.om.Item aExpressionType)
Converts from an internal Saxon type to an Engine type (Java/Ae type). For example, this method will convert a net.sf.saxon.value.DateTimeValue object to an AeSchemaDateTime object. It will convert a net.sf.saxon.value.Boolean to a java.lang.Boolean.

Parameters:
aExpressionType -
